title: Basic Typography through JSON
author: William Anderson
content:
Typography is the art and technique of arranging type to make written language visually appealing and readable. It involves selecting fonts, adjusting sizes, line spacing, and letter spacing to create a balanced design. Typography plays a crucial role in conveying a message's tone, enhancing readability, and guiding readers' focus. From print to digital media, typography influences how people perceive and interact with content. Good typography combines aesthetics with function, shaping the overall user experience.
